title: IMU President - Clay Mathematics Institute
snippet: Professor Carlos Kenig has been ... The President oversees all aspects of the IUM and Executive Committee and chairs the Fields Medal Committee....

title: ICMI EC 2017-2020 | International Commission on Mathematical Instruction
snippet: Kenig is a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and of the American Mathematical Society. He is a member of the National Academy of Sciences and a past vice-president of the American Mathematical Society. Kenig is the President of the IMU, 2019-2022.

title: Curriculum Vitae Carlos E. Kenig cek@math.uchicago.edu Born:
